tag_list: technology, it, consulting, services, servers, networks, computers
overview:
Global Point LLC is the leading provider to IT services in Chicago and suburbs. The company specializes in providing small and medium size businesses with premium quality IT services and professional consulting.

Our certified expert engineering provide businesses with customized solutions fitted for each business and their IT requirements. Our services include Infrastructure Planning and Design, Maintenance, Network management and Security.

Global Point LLC offers services crafted specifically for each business based on a free evaluation of the office computer network.
